title: Looking for members for Tournament on Saturday
body:
Hey guys!
 Looking for 4 members (ADC, Support, Top and Mid) for a small tournament this Saturday. It will likely be 4 or 5 games maximum. It will start at 9AM Australia time (GMT+11). No strict rank requirements. Prizes will be 1000RP and Triumphant Ryze! 

Add me (Adrianus) me or leave a comment :)

replies.body: yo added I can play any role but adc, mid or top pref

Hey, I'm more than ready if you need an ADC. 

IGN:  MrInoeverthin

hey man im happy to play as a top laner if its still available
 add me!
